metadata.synopsis: Players have stolen Tusgront's ring. Plays mainly so players know that the alert level is raised so them being attacked on sight is much more obvious.

0.speaker: Tusgront
0.text: Oi! Someone's taking my sigil ring. You see anyone, you bloody well stab 'em.
0.context: NodeContext: Angered, he's been mugged and the culprit must be nearby
